Boot GUI

The Boot GUI permits to insert the configuration property to start JADE. If no value has been specified by command line the gui is initialized using the default value.
Otherwise using the File button is possible to initialized the gui using values saved in a specific file

The configuration properties are:

Host

In this field is possible to indicate the host name where the main-container is running. When starting a platform the host name must be local host.

Port

To insert the port number

Gui

Select to launch the RMA gui

Container

Select to launch an agent-container

Agents

In this field is possible to insert the agent specifier of the agents to launch. An agent specifier is composed of an agent name and an agent class, separated by ":"

This value can be saved in a file using the Save button.

To run JADE with the inserted values, click the Run button.
